description.p: A Class_of_person is a class that has only individual people as members.
description.example: 'Stress engineer' is a class of person.
'Member of the Institution of Civil Engineers' is a class of person.
description.note: Set theory relationships can be used to define a class of person who is a stress engineer and a MICE, but not a Belgian.
The entity Class_of_person in this part of ISO 10303 is identical to the entity class_of_person in ISO 15926-2.
